oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conclusions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakriainen, Salla
von Essen, Hans
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One of the basic problems in local organic food systems seems to be connected to food chains. The range of creative initiatives covers all thinkable fields: information about ecology, farmers' own activities in creating brands and labels, associations, developing ordering and delivery systems, processing, municipal help, marketing campaigns and so on.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kakriainen, Salla and von Essen, Hans (2005) Conclusions. In: Kakriainen, Salla and von Essen, Hans (Eds.) Obstacles and solutions in use of local and organic food. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 44. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 84-85.
